data.name: 晋江论坛仿豆瓣
data.description: 基于晋江论坛苹果绿修改

data.name: tatoeba.org - Non-green search bar - Set to #777
data.description:
I've set the default for #777 (gray)
I also put in a line to change the paging highlight to match this same #777 color.

You can edit this to make it any color you like, by changing that number.  You may need to also change the color of the text to make things readable if you do.

#669 is a nice faded blue color for this purpose.
#779 is good, too.  * This is the one I'm currently using myself.

The screenshot was taken with this following one installed, too, with a smaller menu bar.
https://userstyles.org/styles/130227/tatoeba-org-revert-to-smaller-menu-bar

data.name: Amazon sponsored content remover.
data.description: Even been annoyed that 50% of the results returned by Amazon search are sponsored content stuff? Well, just remove all of them with three lines of magic!

data.name: tatoeba.org - Easily Readable Numbers of Sentences
data.description:
This fixes the very light gray, harder to read font color for the number of sentences for each tag, to an easier to read black font.

You can edit the color in the CSS after you install this, if you know how.

data.name: Haszkod - Christmas Edition
data.description: Christmas user theme based on Dark Redesign verison.

data.name: steam by BamaBraves
tatoeba.org - Get rid of Dec. 2019 Green Titles
data.description:
This gets rid of the new titles that appeared on December 16, 2019.
The green background with a white font that are on each sentence's page and on the main logged-in home page.  Possibly, this corrects the problem elsewhere on the website, too.

Also, this gets rid of the green behind the second message on the right side of the Wall.

This is likely useful for members with vision problems.

data.name: OcUK Forum - XEN - Complete
data.description:
A dark theme for the new forum at OcUK. Now complete and polished!
 
If you use and like PLEASE donate just £1 for my hard work, paypal: rail.monkey@ntlworld.com
